name: Programme of Learning
description: Programme of Learning data describe the intention, rules, and composition of an institution's qualifications.

name: Area of Learning
description: Area of Learning data describe the structure, rules, and composition of a specialised field, and define the relationship with other Curriculum Components.

name: Unit of Learning
description: Unit of Learning data describe the intention, rules and composition of the sequence of learning activities that, on successful completion, guarantees credit towards a qualification.

name: Element of Learning
description: Element of Learning data describe the intention, rules, and composition of a small sequence of learning activities that will be recognised on successful completion.

name: Learning Outcome
description: Learning Outcome data describe the expected knowledge, skills, or competency that should be acquired on successful completion of a Curriculum Component, and their measurements.

name: Study Application
description: Study Application data represent formal requests to participate in offerings of an institution's curriculum.

name: Financial Assistance
description: Financial Assistance data describe financial support enabling participation in higher education.

name: Enrolment
description: Enrolment data relate to the student's formal registration in a curriculum component.

name: Placement
description: Placement data relate to students undertaking learning in an industry context as partial fulfilment of their academic requirements.

name: Student Progress
description: Student Progress data record the progress of students through the curriculum components that contribute to their completion.

name: Credit
description: Credit data relate to the assessment and recognition of a student's study or work experience.

name: Award
description: Award data relate to the conferral of recognition for completion of study.

name: Timetable
description: Timetable data are related to the scheduling of resources to learning and teaching activities.

name: Learning Activity
description: Learning Activity data relate to tasks designed for students to achieve intended Learning Outcomes.

name: Learning Resource
description: Learning Resource data relate to resources used in Learning Activities.

name: Assessment
description: Assessment data relate to the measurement and evaluation of achievement of Learning Outcomes.

name: Research Opportunity
description: Research Opportunity data describe potential research activities an institution considers undertaking.

name: Research Application
description: Research Application data describe applications to conduct research.

name: Research Award
description: Research Award data relate to resources awarded for the purpose of conducting specified research.

name: Research Project
description: Research Project data describe the management and execution of a research activity.

name: Research Resource
description: Research Resource data relate to the financial, human, material, and knowledge resources used to deliver research.

name: Research Data
description: Research Data include all data captured or generated by researchers in conduct of their research.

name: Research Output
description: Research Output data describe the disseminated or preserved results of undertaking research.

name: Research Outcome
description: Research Outcome data describe the effects or manifestations of research and research outputs.

name: Research Impact
description: Research Impact data represent the measurable contribution of research beyond academia.

name: Strategy
description: Strategy data describe the long-term intentions and plans of action an institution has made to realise objectives it desires.

name: Plan
description: Plan data describe decisions an institution has made about what it will do in order to achieve specific objectives.

name: Programme
description: Programme data define and monitor groups of related projects in which an institution has an interest.

name: Project
description: Project data relate to planned, transient endeavours consisting of interrelated tasks designed to achieve specific objectives.

name: Policy
description: Policy data relate to official statements of the key principles, expectations, and behaviours that govern an institution.

name: Risk
description: Risk data describe possible incidents and the effect they might have upon an institution achieving its objectives.

name: Incident
description: Incident data describe untoward events that do or could result in damage or loss to people, property, information, or infrastructure.

name: Contract
description: Contract data relate to legal documents that specify mutual obligations between two or more parties in a formal agreement.

name: Obligation
description: Obligation data relate to the moral and ethical responsibilities an institution chooses to honour, and to the legal requirements that an institution must meet.

name: Record
description: Record data provide evidence of an institution's significant business activity.

name: Service
description: Service data relate to business activities offered by an institution.

name: Campaign
description: Campaign data relate to marketing, awareness, and promotional activities undertaken by an institution.

name: Communication
description: Communication data relate to all messaging and content broadcast or exchanged between an institution and its constituents, partners, and communities.

name: Event
description: Event data relate to exhibits, meetings, and occasions organised by an institution.

name: Account
description: Account data relate to an institution's records or statements of financial transactions.

name: Budget
description: Budget data relate to planned revenue and expenditure for a given period.

name: Expense
description: Expense data relate to the cost of operations an institution incurs.

name: Financial Liability
description: Financial Liability data relate to an institution's financial debts or obligations.

name: Revenue
description: Revenue data relate to income generated by an institution.

name: General Ledger
description: General Ledger data represent a central record of an institution's financial accounts, summarising all transactions.

name: Financial Asset
description: Financial Asset data refer to an institution's non-physical assets that arise from owning equity or contractual agreements on future cash flows.

name: Physical Asset
description: Physical Asset data identify and describe tangible items of value that are owned or controlled by an institution.

name: Intangible Asset
description: Intangible Asset data refer to an institution's identifiable non-monetary assets that are without physical substance.

name: Collection
description: Collection data describe curated groups of physical or digital items managed by an institution.

name: Entitlement
description: Entitlement data relate to the conditions, rewards, and benefits offered to employees of an institution.

name: Position
description: Position data describe the tasks, duties, and responsibilities for each employee of an institution.

name: Competency
description: Competency data relate to the skills, knowledge, and abilities required to perform the work of an institution.

name: Talent Acquisition
description: Talent Acquisition data are related to the identification, selection, and hiring of people to do work for an institution.

name: Facility
description: Facility data are related to the amenities that an institution provides or operates for defined purposes.

name: Utility
description: Utility data are related to core services an institution consumes.

name: Gift
description: Gift data relate to items, money, or services given voluntarily to an institution.

name: Person
description: Person data describe an individual human being.

name: Creature
description: Creature data describe an individual member of a non-human animal species.

name: Machine
description: Machine data describe an individual device.

name: Prospect
description: Prospect data describe the role of an Individual or Group that has approached, or been approached by, an institution regarding a potential Role.

name: Applicant
description: Applicant data describe the role of an Individual or Group that submits an application to an institution.

name: Student
description: Student data describe the role of an Individual registered to participate in an offering of an institution's curriculum.

name: Staff
description: Staff data describe the role of an Individual performing the work of an institution.

name: Alum
description: Alum data describe the role of an Individual who formerly held another Role with an institution.

name: Customer
description: Customer data describe the role of an Individual or Group that consumes the goods or services offered by an institution.

name: Stakeholder
description: Stakeholder data describe an Individual or Group with an interest in an institution, its work, or its people.

name: Supplier
description: Supplier data describe an Individual or Group that provides goods or services to an institution.

name: Sponsor
description: Sponsor data describe the role of an individual or group that contributes contingent support to an institution.

name: Donor
description: Donor data describe the role of an individual or group that contributes non-contingent support to an institution.

name: Volunteer
description: Volunteer data describe the role of an Individual or Group who freely contribute to an endeavour.

name: Organisation
description: Organisation data relate to the structure and composition of internal and external organisations.

name: Cohort
description: Cohort data identify groups of people who share a particular characteristic.

name: Collective
description: Collective data identify informal groups of people with a shared interest or a common behaviour.

name: Community
description: Community data identify social groups whose members reside in a specific locality and may have common government or common heritage.

name: Indigenous Peoples
description: Indigenous Peoples data relate to individuals who have self-identified as members of a group of Indigenous peoples.

name: Building
description: Building data identify and describe structures that are owned or used by an institution.

name: Campus
description: Campus data are related to the campus locations, grounds, and buildings where an institution conducts its learning, teaching, research, and other business activities.

name: Site
description: Site data are related to an area of ground that is owned or used by an institution.

name: Space
description: Space data identify and describe the physical spaces owned or used by an institution.

name: Calendar
description: Calendar data relate to key dates and time periods of significance to an institution.
